name: Shotgun Spire
description:
NOTE - THIS GAME SEEMS TO RUN POORLY IN BROWSER, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE ZIP OR EXE FOR THE PROPER EXPERIENCE.

Climb the Turret Tower with your over-reactive shotgun!

This game was made in a week for ZenoJam 2022.

Fight through waves of enemies and four bosses in this shoot-em-up with a unique movement style.

Features 4 bosses, a variety of enemies, and an upgrade system.

Controls:

A/D - Move

Mouse - Aim

Mouse Left Click - Shoot

Space - Jump

Shift - Dash (when unlocked)

Tab - Show Gem Count

Tab - Show/Hide Speedrun Timer.
